headline: Tech Weekly Podcast: Rory Carroll reports from CES 2013 in Las Vegas
text: This week Charles Arthur meets John Collison, co-founder of Stripe, the US-based online payment system that's taking on the might of Paypal. Also Rory Carroll reports from this year's Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas where he's encountered mind-controlled toy helicopters and smart forks alongside the launch of HD televisions and next-generation fridges. Finally we have a tech news roundup with Jason Phipps and this week we feature the music of Jeremy Razimbaud aka Morbak Magenta.
